title: No Fashola, Amaechi as Buhari's ministers visit DSS for screening
content: There been much talk around who and who will form President Muhammadu Buharis cabinet and some of the names that have been rumoured are those of former governor of Lagos, Babatunde Fashola and his Rivers counterpart, Rotimi Amaechi but the duo seems to be missing when some of the likely appointees as ministers graced the []
